column1: *Please note that any train departing needs to be rounded up to a full minute in line with the above
Dwell Times – Passenger service to Empty Coaching Stock in the same direction except where otherwisespecified
Front Train Working at Terminal locations:

In the event of Front Train Working with two (or more) loaded services a minimum of 5 minutes should be allowedbetween departure of Front Train and Rear Train to allow indicators etc to be changed. Passenger trains that divideen-route should not be “front trained”.
